Name: Toast & Orange Cocktail
Ingredients: 3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bourbon rounded and enhanced by bitter orange and Peychaud's bitters.
